com.example.rocketapp.controller

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.rocketapp.controller.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles creating, retrieving, and modifying users as well as signing in to firestore.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  UserManager.UserCallback
      Callback returning a User

                              android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences,
                              UserManager.UserCallback onSuccess,
                              ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Creates a new user and logs in.
        Parameters:
        userName - Username for new user
        onSuccess - Callback for when user creation is successful
        onFailure - Callback for when username already exists fails

      • login

        public static void login(android.content.SharedPreferences sharedPreferences,
                         UserManager.UserCallback onSuccess,
                         ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Login to user account with user name.
        Parameters:
        onSuccess - Callback for when login is successful
        onFailure - Callback for when login fails (username does not exist)

                              ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Sync user info to firebase
        Parameters:

        onFailure - Callback for when update fails

      • subscribe

        public static void subscribe(Experiment experiment,
                             Callback onSuccess,
                             ExceptionCallback onFailure)
        Subscribe to an experiment. Subscribed experiments can be retrieved with getSubscribedExperimentArrayList().
        Parameters:
        experiment - The experiment to subscribe the current user to
        onSuccess - Callback for when subscribing is successful
        onFailure - Callback for when subscribing fails
